poll_list.title: Change of Ownership of the Ambassador's Program Multi-Sig - December 12, 2022

discourse_list.title: Change of Ownership of the Ambassador Program's Multi-Sig

content.content: This post is to communicate the MakerDAO Community, Delegates and Mandated Actors the need of a change in the ownership of the Ambassador Program’s Multi-Sig. The ownership currently belongs to @kat as per the MIP55c3-SP7, but due to personal reasons Kat has recently communicated her decision to step down from her role and responsibilities with the program. I’ve been fulfilling this role for the past two months, and the payments were done thanks to the help of @davidutro and @tadeo. After consulting with @prose11, I’m requesting to be made the owner of the multi-sig by Tadeo and David to easen their burden in the following payments of the program.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining the need for a change in ownership of the Ambassador Program's Multi-Sig. The author is requesting to be made the owner of the multi-sig to ease the burden of payments for the program. The post also mentions the previous owner's decision to step down from their role and responsibilities with the program. A third party, @prose11, was consulted before making the request.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: To make sure MKR holders are okay with this change in ownership, GovAlpha will be putting the matter up for polling this coming Monday, December 12. @Recognized-Delegates Please take note. Would also be good to hear from @Davidutro and @tadeo as the comptrollers on this SPF.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal

content.content: I support this request by Sebix. For best operational practice, I recommend adding a new person on the multisig as a comptroller as well.
I support and want to thank @Sebix for taking over the responsibilities of the program.
Why is it a multisig if just 1 person owns it?

PSA: this is indeed a multisig, and it is not owned by 1 person so this request makes total sense. The original SPF can be found here (was not hard to find it on the forum using the search feature). @Sebix good luck and thanks for stepping up!
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving entirely positive feedback on proposal

content.content: As per the passing of this poll, I’m formally requesting @tadeo and @Davidutro to make me owner of the multi-sig with the following address: 0x5e81C926643F630399AFF9cE177eB47b3E274EcE I also want to thank the community for supporting me on this change, and for the overall support the program’s been receiving since it’s inception. Soon we’ll be showing the community the recent projects we’ve been working on and that are almost ready to come out .
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
Author of proposal is asking for feedback
